name: Low-Carb Cauliflower Pizza Crust
author: Linda Nofsinger
summary: This cauliflower pizza crust made with riced cauliflower is firm, flavorful, and low-carb. Apply pizza toppings as you normally would and bake pizza as normal.
ingredients: 1 cup gluten-free baking mix (such as Wheat Belly)
¾ teaspoon garlic powder, or more to taste
¾ teaspoon onion powder, or more to taste
directions: Preheat an indoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly grease
Place riced cauliflower into the bowl of a food processor and grind smaller if needed
Place into a large bowl and add Parmesan cheese, mozzarella cheese, baking mix, salt, basil, garlic powder, onion powder, and oregano
Mix together by hand or with an electric mixer on low speed
Apply 1 to 1 1/2 cups of batter to the grill and cook until golden, about 3 minutes per side
Let cool on a wire rack before using immediately or freezing
